title: Nintendo 3DS
text: Nintendo 3DS Console - Red Metallic Edition, Handheld Console with 3D Display, Touchscreen, Wi-Fi, and SD Card Support

text: F1 24 - Official Formula 1 Racing Game Featuring 2024 Season Cars, Teams & Tracks, Realistic Graphics, Career and Online Modes, Compatible with PlayStation 4

text: Shirt that belonged to the best League of Legends' player in the world, T1 Faker. Size M.

text: Figure of the best League of Legends' champion, Fiora. 50cm tall, hand-painted.

text: Classic Game Boy 24-Game Retro Pack - Retro Handheld Collection, Authentic Titles for Collectors and Gamers

text: League of Legends champion Sion portrait. 24" x 36".

title: PlayStation 2 - BLACK (FAT MODEL)
text: PlayStation 2 fat model in black. Controller and cables included. The all-time best-selling console in history, with a wide catalog full of amazing games that marked our early days!

title: Jojo's Bizarre Adventure All Star Battle
text: Jojo's Bizarre Adventure All Star Battle, PS3. A bizarre fighting game based on Hirohiko Araki's manga, a must-have on every Jojofan's shelf!

title: Metal Gear Solid
text: The first game of the saga Metal Gear Solid, PS1 version. English PAL Version. Accompany the legendary Solid Snake on his mission to Shadow Mosses.
